summary: This document is a chain of emails from February 13, 2020, between attorneys discussing coordination regarding the Epstein matter. Sigrid McCawley introduces Nicole Moss, Chuck Cooper, and Haley Proctor to Michael W. Kirk, noting Moss's representation in an action against Alan Dershowitz. The emails discuss arranging a confidential meeting in NYC to discuss mutual interests in the Epstein criminal investigation.

persons.name: Chuck Cooper
persons.context: Attorney at Cooper & Kirk, PLLC, seeking to arrange a confidential meeting in NYC to discuss mutual interests in the Epstein matter with Michael W. Kirk.

persons.name: Sigrid McCawley
persons.context: Partner at Boies Schiller Flexner LLP who introduces Nicole Moss, Chuck Cooper, and Haley Proctor to Michael W. Kirk, noting Moss's representation in an action against Alan Dershowitz.

persons.name: Nicole Moss
persons.context: Attorney introduced by Sigrid McCawley; is representing a client in an action against Alan Dershowitz in the Southern District of New York.

persons.name: Michael W. Kirk
persons.context: Primary recipient of the email chain; his firm indicates they will continue coordinating with Sigrid McCawley on the criminal investigation and are open to meeting with Chuck Cooper's team.

persons.name: Haley Proctor
persons.context: Attorney introduced by Sigrid McCawley alongside Nicole Moss and Chuck Cooper.

persons.name: Alan Dershowitz
persons.context: Mentioned as the defendant in an action in the Southern District of New York where Nicole Moss is representing a client against him.

connections.description: McCawley introduces Moss to Michael W. Kirk, noting Moss's legal work on a case against Alan Dershowitz.
Cooper seeks to arrange a confidential meeting in NYC with Kirk to discuss mutual interests in the Epstein matter.
Kirk's firm states they have been and will continue to be in touch with McCawley on issues relating to the Epstein criminal investigation.
Moss is representing a client in a legal action against Dershowitz in the Southern District of New York.

events.title: Attorney Email Coordination on Epstein Matter
events.description: Series of emails between attorneys Sigrid McCawley, Chuck Cooper, Michael W. Kirk, and others discussing introduction and arranging a confidential meeting in NYC regarding the Epstein criminal investigation.

keyFacts: Attorneys are coordinating a confidential meeting in New York City to discuss mutual interests in the Epstein criminal investigation.
Nicole Moss is identified as representing a client in an action against Alan Dershowitz in the Southern District of New York.
The email chain reveals ongoing professional coordination between law firms (Boies Schiller Flexner and Cooper & Kirk) and Michael W. Kirk's firm regarding the Epstein matter.
The correspondence emphasizes confidentiality and attorney-client privilege protections.
